meanings.definition: Worn out or no longer in use.
meanings.sent1: The outworn shoes had holes in the soles.
meanings.sent2: The old, outworn car could no longer be driven.
meanings.sent3: The outworn teddy bear was missing an eye and a leg.
meanings.sent4: Her outworn backpack was bursting at the seams.
meanings.sent5: The outworn book had pages falling out from constant use.

meanings.sent1: The outworn dress from the 80s was a hit at the costume party.
meanings.sent2: Her outworn hairstyle was in desperate need of an update.
meanings.sent3: The outworn trend of wearing socks with sandals made a surprising comeback.
meanings.sent4: His outworn jokes fell flat with the younger audience.
meanings.sent5: The outworn music player was replaced by a sleek new model.
